plugins.microphonePermission: EasyGO (Business) uses microphone to enable users to reply to clients/customers
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: EasyGO (Business) securely recognize user speech to reply to clients/customers

plugins.photosPermission: EasyGO (Business) allows users to select photo for your profile/location/menu/product/service

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: EasyGO (Business) uses camera to allow you to capture a photo for your profile/location/menu/product/service
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: EasyGO (Business) allows users to select photo for your profile/location/menu/product/service
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: EasyGO (Business) optionally marks your location using your geo coordinates so that clients/customers can find you
